entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 4:27AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Along The Coast... A strong storm moving through the Bering Sea will bring elevated waters to coastal areas from the Yukon Delta to Point Hope. Water levels will be 2 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line. This will push water up on top of the ice through cracks and along the coast. Ice may also be pushed up on shore.
